1.label: Association group 1
1.description: Changes the LED on the device

2.label: Association group 2
2.description: The alarm sound reports it status to the associated devices

paramInformation.label: Set to Default
paramInformation.description: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings)

paramInformation.label: Destination routine on/off
paramInformation.description: Test connection by sending a periodic test with sound on failure

paramInformation.label: Desitnation routine success time
paramInformation.description: Time it takes to send a new frame after the last frame has successfully send

paramInformation.label: Destination routine failed time
paramInformation.description: Time elapsed between failing to end a frame and sending a new frame.

paramInformation.label: Select index sound/light mode
paramInformation.description: The index of the sound mode when a switch binary/basic set frame been received

paramInformation.label: power offline sound/light mode
paramInformation.description: The sound and light mode that will be used when the device gets unplugged.
